title: Protecting Ember
description: The easy part of Marco “Giggles” Ricci’s job is to separate himself from those his team rescues. Until a year ago, when an unexpected rescue brings him Ember. With a heavy heart, he barely walked away, expecting her to move on with her life, but when she shows back up, he can’t deny the connection he feels to her.Ember has set out to make a new life for herself. Rescued from a human trafficking ring, and with the help of her friend Trista she has the chance to give back to those in need. Things aren’t always as simple as they seem. Not when she learns the man who held her captive for six years isn’t dead. This time she needs to see his death for herself.When Ember stumbles upon information that can help learn King’s identity, nothing will stop her from traveling with the team to exact revenge against her captor. But at what cost?Protecting Ember is the first book in the Bravo Team Series. Happily ever after, guaranteed.
author: Elizabella Baker
